title: Robin's True Goal: Protecting the Straw Hats from Buster Call
summary: Fans theorized that Robin's refusal to return to the crew was motivated by her knowledge of the Buster Call - a devastating fleet attack that CP9 threatened to use on the Straw Hats. Her sacrifice was an act of love to save her friends.
fullText: Many fans discussed how Robin's decision to leave the crew wasn't a betrayal, but a noble sacrifice. When CP9 threatened to call a Buster Call on the Straw Hats (thanks to Aokiji's permission), Robin knew she had to comply to protect her friends. Her statement that she 'cannot accomplish her wish while staying with them' was actually referring to her wish for them to escape Water 7 safely. This theory was widely discussed in forums and highlighted Robin's character development from a loner to someone willing to sacrifice everything for her nakama.
author: One Piece Fan Community

source.title: Why is Nico Robin leaving the crew at Water 7?

title: CP9's Five-Year Mission: The Long Con
summary: Fans theorized about the incredible patience and dedication required for CP9 to maintain their cover for five years in Water 7, suggesting this reveals the World Government's ruthless efficiency and long-term planning capabilities.
fullText: The revelation that Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno had been undercover for five years shocked fans and sparked discussions about the depth of the World Government's conspiracy. Fans theorized that this demonstrated how far the government would go to obtain the Pluton blueprints, and suggested that there might be other sleeper agents throughout the One Piece world. Some fans connected this to the theme that the World Government is willing to use any means necessary to maintain power and suppress ancient knowledge.
author: One Piece Theory Community

source.title: One Piece: The Water 7 Saga is a Masterclass in Villains

title: Lucci's Leopard Form Foreshadows Final Boss Status
summary: When Lucci's leopard transformation was first shown in silhouette, fans immediately theorized that he would be Luffy's primary opponent in the upcoming arc, based on the dramatic reveal and the combination of Devil Fruit and Rokushiki powers.
fullText: The cliffhanger ending with Lucci's transformation in silhouette generated massive fan speculation. Fans theorized that Lucci would be the 'final boss' of the Water 7 saga based on his position as CP9's leader, his cold and ruthless personality, and now the revelation of a powerful Zoan Devil Fruit on top of his Rokushiki mastery. Many correctly predicted that this would lead to an epic battle between Luffy and Lucci, with some fans speculating that Luffy would need to develop new techniques to overcome such a powerful opponent.
author: One Piece Fan Community
